titleStmt.title: A paterne of true prayer A learned and comfortable exposition or commentarie vpon the Lords prayer: wherein the doctrine of the substance and circumstances of true inuocation is euidently and fully declared out of the holie Scriptures. By Iohn Smith, minister and preacher of the Word of God.
titleStmt.author: Smyth, John, d. 1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston for Thomas Man, and are to be sold at his shop in Pater-noster row at the signe of the Talbot,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 22802 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
